definitions.text: the noise of something spattering or sputtering explosively
examples: he heard a spatter of gunfire

definitions.text: an utterance (of words) with spitting sounds (as in rage)
cause to undergo a process in which atoms are removed
examples: The solar wind protons must sputter away the surface atoms of the dust

definitions.text: climb awkwardly, as if by scrambling
utter with a spitting sound, as if in a rage
spit up in an explosive manner
